nodes.excerpt: https://burnrate.fyi is a SaaS expense estimator designed with ease-of-use in mind. In three easy steps you can choose the products or services you want, configure them, and see your expected burnrate at the end of each month.

localize.tagline: 5分钟内免费估算SaaS开支

localize.description: https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS費用估算器，設計時考慮到了易用性。在三個簡單的步驟中，你可以選擇你想要的產品或服務，配置它們，並在每個月末看到你的預期燃燒率。

nodes.excerpt: Looking to get genuine users on-board with minimum drop offs? Our offer includes identity verifications (KYC) for automating individual on-boarding and enhancing customer experience. We envision creating a trusted ecosystem where identity is the key to access.
nodes.title: Invoid - Enabling KYC automation & identity verification in India
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 想让真正的用户以最少的流失率入职？我们提供的服务包括身份验证(KYC)，以实现个人入职的自动化，并提升客户体验。我们设想创建一个可信的生态系统，身份是访问的关键。
localize.tagline: 在印度实现KYC自动化和身份验证。

localize.description: 想讓真正的用戶以最少的流失率入職？我們提供的服務包括身份驗證(KYC)，以實現個人入職的自動化，並提升客戶體驗。我們設想創建一個可信的生態系統，身份是訪問的關鍵。
localize.tagline: 在印度實現KYC自動化和身份驗證。

nodes.excerpt: Protect your ecommerce margins & increase average order value by blocking unwanted discount codes from coupon extensions like Honey, CapitalOne Shopping, Piggy, and more. Currently available for Shopify Plus users. Not Shopify Plus? Get on the wait list.

nodes.excerpt: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
nodes.title: Horae - Measure your life, log your hours and document your life
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

localize.description: 一款专注于生活本身的时间追踪应用，而不是项目、任务和更具体的类型。它有助于概括一天的生活，让你更容易记录生活。它只需要5秒钟就可以记录你的一天。你不必记住每一分钟。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，记录你的时间，记录你的生活。

localize.description: 一款專注於生活本身的時間追蹤應用，而不是項目、任務和更具體的類型。它有助於概括一天的生活，讓你更容易記錄生活。它只需要5秒鐘就可以記錄你的一天。你不必記住每一分鐘。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，記錄你的時間，記錄你的生活。

nodes.excerpt: With hydesk, we want to allow people to be more flexible within their workspace. You can use it while sitting to have the perfect viewing height for any screen or just standing up to boost your creativity and well-being.
nodes.title: hydesk - A fully foldable and sustainable stand-up desk

localize.tagline: 一張可摺疊、可持續發展的站立式辦公桌

nodes.excerpt: Draw something and create a NFT in just a few seconds, it will eternize your art on Blockchain. Nifty Ink works on xDAI chain, you can mint a NFT just for a few fraction of a cent, so you need to have at least a few cents on xDAI token.
nodes.title: Nifty Ink - Draw something and make it a NFT for less than 1 cent
nodes.author: makio

localize.description: 在几秒钟内画出一些东西，并创建一个NFT，它将使你的艺术在区块链上永恒化。Nifty Ink在xDAI链上工作，你只需要花几分钱就可以铸造一个NFT，所以你需要至少有几分钱的xDAI代币。
localize.tagline: 画一些东西，然后把它做成NFT，价格不到1分钱。

localize.description: 在幾秒鐘內畫出一些東西，並創建一個NFT，它將使你的藝術在區塊鏈上永恆化。Nifty Ink在xDAI鏈上工作，你只需要花幾分錢就可以鑄造一個NFT，所以你需要至少有幾分錢的xDAI代幣。
localize.tagline: 畫一些東西，然後把它做成NFT，價格不到1分錢。

localize.tagline: 从微博和笔记中制作华丽的内容卡片。

nodes.excerpt: Text Blaze allows you to save text snippets and insert them anywhere on the web using keyboard shortcuts. Snippets can be plain text, but can also include dynamic dates, formulas, real-time input and integrations with other apps. Try it, it's free!
nodes.title: Text Blaze - Save time by eliminating repetitive typing
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Text Blaze允许您保存文本片段，并使用键盘快捷键将其插入到网络上的任何地方。短片可以是纯文本，但也可以包括动态日期、公式、实时输入以及与其他应用程序的集成。试试吧，它是免费的
localize.tagline: 消除重复打字，节省时间。

localize.description: Text Blaze允許您保存文本片段，並使用鍵盤快捷鍵將其插入到網絡上的任何地方。短片可以是純文本，但也可以包括動態日期、公式、實時輸入以及與其他應用程序的集成。試試吧，它是免費的
localize.tagline: 消除重複打字，節省時間。

nodes.excerpt: Without any coding expertise, you can set up Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics 4, Facebook Pixels, and Universal Analytics Enhanced Ecommerce and many others into your Shopify store. Analyzify comes up with a Done-For-You setup option at no extra cost.

nodes.excerpt: Make your user interface a little bit better by receiving weekly UI/UX insights. If you're a developer, solo-founder, product manager, or you feel the pain of user interface design this newsletter is specially for you.

nodes.excerpt: With embed.so, you just need to upload a video, and you will get the embed code in minutes. Place the code to your website, and see the video gets displayed 🤩 It's time to upgrade your website, make it more personal and engaging! 💪
nodes.title: embed.so - Embed videos to make your website more personal and engaging

localize.tagline: 嵌入视频，使您的网站更加个性化和吸引人。

nodes.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
nodes.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life
nodes.author: John Caffier

localize.description: 人生是一场神奇的旅行，为什么不从中获得一些纪念品呢？1. 打开应用程序。2. 写下当天你所感谢的3件事。3. 就这样吧! 我们正在努力开发令人兴奋的功能。祝你在创新的纪念品感恩追踪器应用中玩得开心!
localize.tagline: 追踪生活中美好事物的感恩日记。

localize.description: 人生是一場神奇的旅行，爲什麼不從中獲得一些紀念品呢？1. 打開應用程序。2. 寫下當天你所感謝的3件事。3. 就這樣吧! 我們正在努力開發令人興奮的功能。祝你在創新的紀念品感恩追蹤器應用中玩得開心!
localize.tagline: 追蹤生活中美好事物的感恩日記。

localize.description: 是時候推出Planny 5了。Planny 5結合了全新的設計和許多新功能。開始計劃你的一天，完成你所有的日常任務，並回顧你最近的生產力。三個簡單的步驟，隨着時間的推移，變得更加高效。
localize.tagline: 在你的 Apple 設備上計劃並完成日常任務

nodes.excerpt: Ark7 is a real estate investment platform where you can buy property shares at as low as $5 to earn passive monthly income and future appreciation. In the meantime, you don’t have to worry about property management because we take care of it.
nodes.title: Ark7 - Real estate investment as easy as stocks
nodes.author: Meng Xu

localize.description: 方舟7号是一个房产投资平台，在这里，您可以以低至5元的价格购买房产股，每月赚取被动收入和未来升值。同时，您不用担心物业管理，因为我们会负责。
localize.tagline: 房产投资像股票一样简单

localize.description: 方舟7號是一個房產投資平臺，在這裏，您可以以低至5元的價格購買房產股，每月賺取被動收入和未來升值。同時，您不用擔心物業管理，因爲我們會負責。
localize.tagline: 房產投資像股票一樣簡單

nodes.excerpt: Can you beat a Chess computer written with 1KB of Javascript?
nodes.title: The Kilobyte's Gambit - Try beating 1024 bytes of Javascript
nodes.author: Mahesh Shrestha

localize.description: 你能打败用1KB的Javascript编写的棋牌电脑吗？
localize.tagline: 尝试击败1024字节的Javascript

localize.description: 你能打敗用1KB的Javascript編寫的棋牌電腦嗎？
localize.tagline: 嘗試擊敗1024字節的Javascript
